ccrn.description:
Customs Cargo Reference Number
Mandatory if transport mode is ROAD

goodsItemNo.description:
Goods item sequence number
Mandatory if transport mode is ROAD

actualControlPoint.description:
Actual Control Point Location
Mandatory if transport mode is ROAD

matchedInd.description:
Matched Indicator
Y - Keyword Matched
N - Keyword not matched

ceRefNo.description:
C&E Reference Number
Mandatory if transport mode is AIR

umr.description:
Unique Manifest Reference
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

specialStatement.description:
Special Statement
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

version.description:
Version Number
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

masterItemNo.description:
Master Item No
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

consignmentItemNo.description:
Consignment Item No
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL

cargoItemNo.description:
Cargo Item No
Mandatory if transport mode is OCEAN, RIVER, FERRY and RAIL
